name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ava: AI-Powered Job Search by Athyna

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ava: AI-Powered LinkedIn Profile Optimization, Tailored Resumes, and Career Guidance - Elevate Your Job Search Today!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Ava, the ultimate Chrome Extension designed to revolutionize your job search experience. Developed by Athyna, a global talent platform, Ava harnesses the power of AI to optimize your LinkedIn profile and maximize your chances of landing your dream job.

Key Features:

• Profile Optimization: Ava analyzes your entire LinkedIn profile and provides a full assessment, scoring it from 0 to 100%. It then offers personalized suggestions and AI-generated copy for each section, allowing you to boost your profile instantly.
• Resume Tailoring: With Ava's Profile Tailoring feature, creating a custom-made resume for any job application is a piece of cake. Simply navigate to the LinkedIn Job board, click on the ‘Generate Tailored Resume’ button, and Ava will open a new window with an AI-generated PDF resume, tailored to the job you're applying for. Then you can edit or modify any part of the resume before downloading it. Simple!
• Matching Index: Ava introduces a proprietary AI-powered Matching Index, which assesses your fit with a specific job opening. By analyzing both your talent profile and the job description, Ava calculates a percentage range from 0 to 100%, indicating how well-suited you are for the position. You can view your Matching Index for any job on LinkedIn by clicking on the Matching Index button in the overview section.

Why Choose Ava?

• Expert Career Guidance: Ava is your personal career coach, providing data-driven insights and actionable tips to refine your professional brand and showcase your unique strengths.
• Precision Targeting: Ava crafts tailored resumes laser-focused on the specific requirements of your dream roles, showing how you are the ideal candidate and increasing your chances of getting hired. Woohoo!
• Expanded Opportunity: Leverage Ava's AI to get your profile in front of the right people at the right time. Attract more views from recruiters, secure more interviews, and open doors to exciting career opportunities.
• Competitive Edge: In a crowded applicant market, Ava gives you the advantage by optimizing every aspect of your application. Outshine the competition and position yourself as the top choice with Ava by your side.

Whether you're actively seeking new opportunities or looking to optimize your online presence, Ava is your go-to tool. With its intuitive interface and powerful AI algorithms, Ava empowers you to showcase your skills, tailor your applications, and increase your chances of success in the competitive job market.

Elevate your career trajectory with Ava today!
